title: WOW~~ LUXURY 3 BED (FLEX 4!!+2 bathroom with HUGE TERRACE!! (DOORMAN/G
posting_body: ['WOW!!', '\xa0LUXURY 3 BED (FLEX 4!!)+2 bathroom with HUGE TERRACE!!', '(DOORMAN/GYM/ROODTOP ETC)', 'Listing ID #: 138326', 'Price: $7,990', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 3.0', 'Bathrooms: 2.0', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Garage', 'Subway', 'Laundry', 'Bicycle Room', 'Storage', 'Lounge', 'Valet', 'Roof Deck', 'Wheelchair Access', 'WiFi', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Receiving Room', 'Business Center', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Walls OK', 'Terrace', 'Outdoor Space', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Renovated', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Light', 'Eat In Kitchen', 'Walk In Closet', 'Convertible', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'WOW!!', '3 Bed(Flex 4!!!)+ 2 bathroom+Huge Terrace!!', 'Rooms, a Windowed Open Kitchen, 2 Entrances, Walk-in Closet, and a Large Corner Living Area with Excellent Northern Light.', 'Flex 4.', 'LUXURY BUILDING.', 'ROOF/GYMS.', 'BASKETBALL COURT.', 'DOORMAN 24/7.', 'APARTMENT FEATURES Window Treatments Dining Area AC: Central Heat: Radiator New Windows High Ceilings WIC Abundant Closets Closets', '[6] KITCHEN Open Pass Through', 'Windowed Dishwasher Stainless Steel Appliances Microwave BATHROOM Half Bath Windowed CONTACT ME TODAY TO VIEW:', 'Sharon Banta.', 'SPBANTA@KW.COM 2039185828', 'Sharon Priya Banta', 'Phone: 203-918-5828', 'Mobile: 203-918-5828', 'Fax: 212-227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'New York Living Solutions - Keller Williams New York City \xa0 203-918-5828 \xa0 203-918-5828 \xa0 FAX 212-227-1120 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Sharon Priya Banta at 203-918-5828']
